attributes.action: Tory members must be on the electoral register to be able to vote on next PM
attributes.background: It struck me that when the BBC were interviewing Tory party members that some were not UK citizens. It dies not feel democratic that non UK citizens can vote on who will be our next Prime minister. It is hypocritical that the candidates want to force through Brexit for the sake of democracy.

rejection.details: This would be a decision for the Conservative Party and not the UK Government or Parliament.
